--- Arvind Gupta\

***

### Ingest
#### year, country, life expectancy

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/gapminder/gapminder-all-years.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Wrangle
#### enrich, clean, filter

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

# Enrich with continent using country code
df$continent <- countrycode(df$country_code, origin = 'iso3c', destination = 'continent')

# Select life expectancy
gapminder <- df %>% select(year, country, continent, lex)

# Remove cases with NA
gapminder <- gapminder[complete.cases(gapminder), ]

# Filter for decades
gapminder <- filter(gapminder, year %in% c(1950, 1960, 1970, 1980, 1990, 2000, 2010, 2020))
gapminder

```


### Plot
#### color by continent

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

continent_palette <- c("Africa" = "#5555A4", "Americas" = "#1BBDC5", "Asia" = "#DA3690", "Europe" = "#69BF68", "Oceania" = "#E78724")

theme_opts <- theme(
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 12, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 12),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position='top',
    strip.text = element_text(size = rel(1.1))
  )

v1 <- ggplot(gapminder) + 
  # Factoring years will show all
  geom_jitter(aes(x=factor(year), y=lex, color=continent), alpha = 0.5, size = 2.5) +
  scale_color_manual(values = continent_palette) +
  labs(title = "Gapminder",
       subtitle = NULL,
       caption = NULL,
       x = NULL,
       y = "Life Expectancy") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```

### Plot
#### as facet

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

v2 <- ggplot(gapminder) + 
  geom_jitter(aes(x=factor(year), y=lex, color=continent), alpha = 0.5, size = 2.5) +
  scale_color_manual(values = continent_palette) +
  facet_wrap(~ continent, scales = "fixed", ncol = 1 ) +
  labs(title = "Gapminder",
       subtitle = NULL,
       caption = NULL,
       x = NULL,
       y = "Life Expectancy") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```
